entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 12:59 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
